A

App - Class in Tanks
The main application class for the tank game, managing game initialization, input handling, game state updates, and rendering.
App() - Constructor for class Tanks.App
Constructor for the game application, initializes configuration path and tank list.
applyMovingAverage(ArrayList<Float>) - Static method in class Tanks.Terrain
Applies a moving average filter to the terrain heights to smooth out the graphical representation.
